tuv.seg: Disability payments and work
Na híocaíochtaí míchumais agus obair
• Employment and disability payments
• Fostaíocht agus íocaíochtaí míchumais
If you are getting certain disability payments you may be allowed to do work or training that is considered rehabilitative or therapeutic
Má tá íocaíochtaí áirithe míchumais á bhfáil agat, b’fhéidir go gceadófaí duit obair nó oiliúint a dhéanamh a mheastar atá athshlánaithe nó teiripeach
People getting Illness Benefit and Invalidity Pension cannot work (except for unpaid voluntary work). They must transfer to the Partial Capacity Scheme if they wish to work
Ní mór do dhaoine atá ag fáil íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh ar mian leo oibriú (gan obair dheonach a áireamh) aistriú chuig an Scéim um Chumas Páirteach
In most cases you need permission to take up rehabilitative work, voluntary work or training
I roinnt cásanna, teastaíonn cead uait chun glacadh le hobair athshlánúcháin nó le hoiliúint athshlánúcháin
This permission is sometimes called an exemption
Tugtar díolúine ar an gcead sin corruair
Exemptions are always granted for a specific period of time
Deonaítear díolúintí (le haghaidh cúrsaí oibre agus cúrsaí oiliúna araon) do thréimhse shonrach ama i gcónaí
At the end of that period you must re-apply
Ní mór duit iarratas a dhéanamh an athuair ag deireadh na tréimhse sin
In general, if you are getting a means-tested payment your income from work will be assessed in the means test
Go ginearálta, measúnófar d’ioncam ón obair i dtástáil acmhainne má tá íocaíocht atá tástáilte ó thaobh acmhainne á fáil agat
However some of your income from work is not assessed
Ní mheasúnófar cuid de d’ioncam ón obair, áfach
Employment and disability payments
Fostaíocht agus íocaíochtaí míchumais
Social assistance (means-tested) payments: Disability Allowance and Blind Pension are means-tested disability payments
Íocaíochtaí míchumais chúnaimh shóisialta: Íocaíochtaí míchumais ar a ndéantar tástáil mhaoine iad an Liúntas Míchumais agus Pinsean na nDall
If you wish to do rehabilitative work, you must get written permission from the Department of Social Protection (DSP) before starting any work
Más mian leat obair athshlánaithe a dhéanamh, ní mór duit cead i scríbhinn a fháil ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí chun do Liúntas Míchumais nó Pinsean na nDall a choimeád

For both payments you need to provide a letter from your doctor certifying that the proposed work is rehabilitative. You also need to provide confirmation of your earnings (a payslip, your contract of employment or a letter from your employer)
Maidir leis an dá íocaíocht, teastaíonn uait litir a sholáthar ó do dhochtúir a dheimhníonn gurb obair athshlánaithe atá i gceist leis an obair a bheartaítear a dhéanamh
You do not need to have been getting your payment for a minimum period of time before you can apply for permission to work
Maidir leis an dá íocaíocht, ní mór duit dearbhú do thuilleamh (duillín phá, do chonradh fostaíochta nó litir ó d’fhostóir) a sholáthar
You may keep your Disability Allowance or Blind Pension if you get an exemption and your income is below a certain level
Ní gá go raibh d’íocaíocht á fáil agat ar feadh tréimhse íosta sular féidir leat iarratas a dhéanamh
To qualify for a means-tested payment your income from various sources is examined to see whether it is under a certain level
Chun cáiliú d’íocaíocht ar a ndéantar tástáil mhaoine ó fhoinsí éagsúla, scrúdaítear d’ioncam féachaint an bhfuil sé faoi leibhéal áirithe
Some earnings from rehabilitative work are not taken into account in the assessment of your means and do not affect your payment
Ní chuirtear roinnt tuilleamh ó obair athshlánaithe san áireamh sa mheasúnú ar do mhaoin agus ní dhéanann siad difear do d’íocaíocht

For Disability Allowance and Blind Pension, earnings of up to €120 from rehabilitative work (either as an employee or as a self-employed person) are not taken into account at all in the assessment of means
I gcás Liúntas Míchumais agus Phinsean na nDall, ní chuirtear tuillimh a fhad le €120 ó obair athshlánaithe san áireamh sa mheasúnú ar do mhaoin
(The means assessed are your gross earnings less PRSI, any pension contributions and any union dues
(Is ionann an mhaoin ar a ndéantar measúnú agus d'olltuillimh lúide ÁSPC, aon ranníocaíochtaí pinsin agus aon dleachtanna ceardchumainn
You cannot deduct income tax or income levies.)
Ní féidir leat cáin ioncaim nó tobhaigh ioncaim a bhaint as seo.)
If you earn more than €120 per week from rehabilitative work, 50% of your earnings between €120 and €350 are not taken into account in the Disability Allowance or Blind Pension means test
Má tá do thuillimh ó obair athshlánaithe os cionn €120 sa tseachtain, ní thógfar 50% ded' thuillimh idir €120 agus €350 san áireamh sa tástáil acmhainne don Liúntas Míchumais nó Pinsean na nDall

Disability Allowance: all earnings over €350 are assessed as income and your entitlement to Disability Allowance will be reduced in line with the appropriate reduced rates of payment for Disability Allowance
Measúnófar, ámh, tuillimh iomlán os cionn €350 mar ioncam agus laghdófar do theidlíocht don Liúntas Míchumais ar aon dul leis na rátaí laghdaithe íocaíochta cuí don Liúntas Míchumais

If you have no other means, the maximum amount you can earn is €427.50 and still keep an entitlement to the minimum personal payment of €3 (2017). If you are getting payments for a qualified adult or qualified children your means from rehabilitative work are deducted from the family rate that applies to you
Mura mbíonn aon acmhainní eile agat, is é €427.50 an t-uasmhéid is féidir leat a thuilleamh agus do theidlíocht fós don íocaíocht íosta an Liúntais Mhíchumais €3 a choinneáil
Blind Pension: all earnings over €350 will also be assessed as income and your entitlement to Blind Pension will be reduced in line with the appropriate reduced rates of payment for Blind Pension
Má tá Pinsean na nDall agat measúnófar aon thuillimh os cionn €350 agus laghdófar do theidlíocht do Phinsean na nDall ar aon dul leis na rátaí laghdaithe íocaíochta cuí do Phinsean na nDall
If you have no other means, the maximum amount you can earn is €432.60 and still keep an entitlement to the minimum personal payment of €3 (2017)
Mura mbíonn aon acmhainní eile agat, is é €432.60 an t-uasmhéid is féidir leat a thuilleamh agus do theidlíocht fós don íocaíocht íosta an Phinsin na nDall a choinneáil
While no restriction has been placed on the number of hours you may work you should use a maximum of 20 hours a week as a guideline
Cé nach bhfuil aon bhac ar uimhir na n-uaireanta gur féidir leat a oibriú ba chóir duit uasmhéid 20 uair a úsáid mar threoirlíne

Social insurance payments: Invalidity Pension and Illness Benefit are social insurance (PRSI-based) payments. You cannot work while you are getting these payments (with the exception of voluntary unpaid work)
Íocaíochtaí árachais shóisialta: Íocaíochtaí árachais shóisialta (ÁSPC-bhunaithe) iad Pinsean Easláinte agus Sochar Breoiteachta
If you have been getting Invalidity Pension or Illness Benefit (for at least 6 months) you can apply for Partial Capacity Benefit, if you have a reduced capacity to work
Ma bhí Pinsean Easláinte nó Sochar Breoiteachta á fháil agat (ar feadh 6 mhí ar a laghad), féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar Shochar Cumais Pháirtigh
The work does not have to be considered rehabilitative
má laghdaíodh do chumas chun oibre
You may have to pay income tax on your total income
Ní gá go meastar gurb athshlánaithe an obair seo
Exemptions for rehabilitative work are no longer available
Níl fáil a thuilleadh ar dhíolúintí ar obair athshlánaithe
Occupational Injuries Benefit Scheme and rehabilitative work
An Scéim um Shochair Dhíobhálacha Ceirde agus obair athshlánaithe
Injury Benefit is one of the benefits available under the Occupational Injuries Scheme
I measc na sochar ar a bhfuil fáil faoin Scéim um Shochair Dhíobhálacha Ceirde tá Sochar Díobhála
If you are getting Injury Benefit you can do light voluntary work
Má tá Sochar Díobhála á fháil agat, féadfaidh tú obair éadroim dheonach a dhéanamh
You can also do part-time work which is part of a treatment or charitable in character (provided you do not earn more than €50 a week) without permission
Ina theannta sin, féadfaidh tú obair pháirtaimseartha a dhéanamh atá mar chuid de chóireáil nó atá de chineál carthanachta mura dtuilleann tú breis agus €50 sa tseachtain) gan cead a fháil
However if you wish to do other rehabilitative work or a training course you must get written permission from the DSP (called an exemption) before starting
Más mian leat obair eile athshlánaithe nó cúrsa oiliúna a dhéanamh, áfach, ní mór duit cead i scríbhinn a fháil ón RCS (ar a dtugtar díolúine) sula dtosaíonn tú
Exemptions allowing a person to work are not normally granted within the first 26 weeks of Injury Benefit
Ní gnách go gceadaítear díolúintí a cheadaíonn do dhuine oibriú laistigh de na chéad 26 seachtain de Shochar Díobhála
Incapacity Supplement is paid to people who are getting Disablement Pension and who do not qualify for any other disability payments
Íoctar Forlíonadh Éagumais le daoine ag a bhfuil Sochar Míchumais á fháil agus nach gcáilítear iad le haghaidh aon íocaíochtaí eile míchumais
You can work provided you do not earn more than €33 a week on average
Féadfaidh tú oibriú a fhad agus nach dtuilleann tú breis agus €33 sa tseachtain
However if you wish to do other rehabilitative work or a training course you must get written permission from the DSP before starting
Más mian leat obair eile athshlánaithe nó cúrsa oiliúna a dhéanamh, áfach, ní mór duit cead i scríbhinn a fháil ón RCS sula dtosaíonn tú
Initial requests for an exemption to do training courses are automatically granted but subsequent requests are referred to a DSP medical advisor
Ceadaítear iarratais ar dhíolúine chun cúrsaí oiliúna a dhéanamh go huathoibríoch ach cuirtear iarratais ina dhiaidh sin faoi bhráid comhairleoir leighis den RCS
If you wish to take part in a Community Employment Scheme you cannot retain your Incapacity Supplement but you can retain your Disablement Benefit
Más mian leat páirt a ghlacadh i Scéim Fostaíocht Pobail, ní féidir leat d’Fhorlíonadh Éagumais a choimeád, ach féadfaidh tú do Shochar Míchumais a choimeád
People getting Disablement Pension (without another payment) can work (full- or part-time) and do not need permission from the Department
Féadfaidh daoine ag a bhfuil Sochar Míchumais (gan íocaíocht eile) oibriú (go lánaimseartha nó go páirtaimseartha) agus ní gá dóibh cead a fháil ón Roinn
Employment schemes and other payments
Scéimeanna fostaíochta agus íocaíochtaí eile
People getting Disability Allowance can qualify for the Rural Social Scheme (if they are actively farming or fishing)
Is féidir le daoine atá ag fáil Liúntas Míchumais cáiliú le haghaidh an Scéim Shóisialta Tuaithe (más ag feirmeoireacht nó ag iascaireacht go gníomhach atá siad)
People getting Illness Benefit, Invalidity Pension, Disability Allowance, and Blind Pension can qualify for the Work Placement Programme and Community Employment
Is féidir le daoine atá ag fáil Sochar Breoiteachta, Pinsean Easláine, Liúntas Míchumais agus Phinsean na nDall cáiliú le haghaidh an Chláir um Shocrúchán Oibre agus Fostaíocht Pobail
People getting disability payments are not eligible for the TÚS or Gateway schemes
Ní incháilithe i leith scéimeanna TÚS ná Gateway atá daoine atá ag fáil íocaíochtaí míchumais
People getting Disability Allowance and Blind Pension can qualify for Family Income Supplement (FIS) if they meet the criteria
Is féidir le daoine atá ag fáil Liúntas Míchumais agus Pinsean na nDall cáiliú le haghaidh Forlíonadh Ioncaim Teaghlaigh (FIT) má chomhlíonann siad na critéir
People getting Invalidity Pension and Illness Benefit cannot work and therefore cannot qualify for FIS
Ní féidir le daoine atá ag fáil Pinsean Easláinte agus Sochar Breoiteachta oibriú agus dá bhrí sinn ní féidir leo cáiliú le haghaidh FIT
People getting Partial Capacity Benefit do not qualify for FIS
Ní cháilíonn daoine atá ag fáil Sochar Cumais Pháirtigh le haghaidh FIT
If you work while getting Disability Allowance or Blind Pension you can retain any extra benefits you were getting
Má oibríonn tú le linn duit Liúntas Míchumais nó Pinsean na nDall a fháil, féadfaidh tú aon sochair bhreise a bhí tú ag fáil a choinneáil
However the amount of Rent Supplement you get may be affected by your increased income
Mar sin féin, is féidir le d’ioncam méadaithe dul i bhfeidhm ar mhéid an Fhorlíonta Cíosa a fhaigheann tú
In general you can retain any extra benefits you were getting when you take part in an employment scheme
Go ginearálta, is féidir leat aon sochair bhreise a bhí tú ag fáil a choinneáil nuair a ghlacann tú páirt i scéim fostaíochta
You can read about Rent Supplement and how additional income from work or taking part in an employment scheme may affect it in our document on Rent Supplement and changes to your circumstances

Is féidir leat léamh faoin bhForlíonadh Cíosa agus conas a d’fhéadfadh ioncam breise ón obair nó ó pháirt a ghlacadh i scéim fostaíochta dul i bhfeidhm air inár gcáipéis maidir le Forlíonadh Cíosa agus athruithe ar do chúinsí
If you are getting Disability Allowance or Blind Pension and take up a place on a FET training course you receive a training allowance at the same rate as your social welfare payment

Más rud é go bhfuil Liúntas Míchumais nó Pinsean na nDall á fháil agat agus go nglacann tú le háit ar chúrsa oiliúna FET, gheobhaidh tú liúntas oiliúna ag an ráta céanna is atá d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh
Your social welfare payment is suspended when you are on the training course
Tá d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh ar fionraí agus tú ar an gcúrsa oiliúna
You can return to your social welfare payment when you leave the training course
Is féidir leat d’íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fháil arís nuair a fhágann tú an cúrsa oiliúna

If you were getting Invalidity Pension or Illness Benefit, and take up a place on a FET training course you will continue to get your full social welfare payment including any increases you get for your dependents

Más rud é go raibh tú ag fáil Pinsean Easláine nó Sochar Breoiteachta agus go nglacann tú áit ar chúrsa oiliúna de chuid FET, leanfaidh tú ar aghaidh ag fáil d’íocaíochta iomláine leasa shóisialaigh, lena n-áirítear aon mhéaduithe a fhaigheann tú i gcomhair do chleithiúnaithe
You do not get a training allowance or a training bonus
Ní bhfaighidh tú liúntas oiliúna ná bónas oiliúna
You must always apply for prior written permission from DSP before you can take up a training course
Ní mór duit i gcónaí iarratas a dhéanamh ar réamhchead i scríbhinn ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí sular féidir leat tabhairt faoi chúrsa oiliúna
You can read more in our document on training allowances
Is féidir tuilleadh faisnéise a léamh inár gcáipéis maidir le liúntais oiliúna
You retain any extra benefits that you had before taking up the course
Coinníonn tú aon sochair bhreise a bhí agat sular thug tú faoin gcúrsa
You can read about how taking part in a training course may affect your Rent Supplement in our document on Rent Supplement and changes to your circumstances
Is féidir leat léamh faoi conas a d’fhéadfaí dul i bhfeidhm ar d’Fhorlíonadh Cíosa dá nglacfá páirt i gcúrsa oiliúna inár gcáipéis maidir le Forlíonadh Cíosa agus athruithe ar do chúinsí
